title: LF HIGH SILVER/LOW-MID GOLD ADC DUO
body:
I'm a **support main** with high experience with many supports over the past seasons; I peaked in season 4 (Gold 2) and didn't play in season 5. Now i'm in Silver 1, climbing pretty quickly.

Basically here are my criteria to team with me;
- **No flaming at all,** doesn't matter whose fault it was, if you flame that's the last game i'm playing with you.
- We don't surrender regardless of the circumstances. In silver/gold players make throws left, right and centre.
- You are an ADC main with **high mechanical experience.**

Teamspeak 3 is optional, but preferred.

My winrates as of now are below;
Thresh 58% (22/16)
Morgana 56% (14/11)
Leona 73% (8/3)
[I can play virtually _every_ support, so if you have a preference make sure you let me know.]

If you can't find my name, it's a sign we shouldn't be playing together. I would really prefer people 17+, I really don't care what gender you are, so if you are a female i'll conduct myself the same as I would my male friends, so you don't have to worry about being treated differently.

Enjoy the rest of your day, send me a message and i'll let you know if i'm free to play.

**-Sud**

replies.body: This man's CS is absolutely terrible. Add me instead.
And your KDA is terrible. He said he didnt want a negative person.

My KDA is higher than yours... I don't know what else to say...
Do you have a problem with numbers? 3.99>3.63.

>You are an ADC main with high mechanical experience.

High mechanical experience and Silver-Gold ADC's don't go together.

If an ADC is actually good they wouldn't be that low an elo.

>
> High mechanical experience and Silver-Gold ADC's don't go together.
> 
> If an ADC is actually good they wouldn't be that low an elo.

You'd be surprised, i've actually met a lot of ADCs who don't end up in the middle of a teamfight and can kite fairly easily. I believe there are some ADC mains who find it difficult to climb, not because of their mechanical capabilities, but because of their total lack of common sense. [i.e. running into the midst of a baron fight, attempting a 1v3 as an unfed vayne and/or face checking brushes late game].

In my belief, some crucial things can be taught, which can increase a player's capabilities exponentially.

Add me. The sky shall be the limit.

I have trouble not flaming people - something I must fix. Your company on the Rift will be incentive not to be a wanker.
